definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: Let Nikon's Laser Rangefinders lead the way to a better game.
sentences.chinese: 让尼康的激光测距仪引路一个更好的游戏。

sentences.english: In the new century, face a new rangefinder will play a bigger role.
sentences.chinese: 在新的世纪里，面貌一新的测距仪将发挥更大作用。

sentences.english: Range finder cameras are not good for low-light situations.
sentences.chinese: 测距仪相机不适合低光情况良好。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic rangefinder mainly has the hardware circuit and software design.
sentences.chinese: 超声波测距仪主要有硬件电路和软件设计。

sentences.english: The accuracy of a pulse-type EDM1 is compatible with that of the phase-type instruments.
sentences.chinese: 激光脉冲测距仪的精度已提高到同相位式测距仪一样。

sentences.english: The accuracy of a pulse-type EDM1 is compatible with that of the phase-type instruments.
sentences.chinese: 激光脉冲测距仪的精度已提高到同相位式测距仪一样。

sentences.english: Life with Nikon introduces the optical technologies of Laser Rangefinders.
sentences.chinese: 与尼康生命介绍了激光测距仪的光学技术。

sentences.english: LF1 LRF is a photon Radar system, t.
sentences.chinese: LF1激光测距仪是一种光子雷达系统。

sentences.english: We took measurements with laser rangefinders to measure the loss of height of the glaciers.
sentences.chinese: 我们用激光测距仪测量冰川高度的下降幅度。
